subject: Order #SSN2054 Order Tracking Issue – Possible Lost Shipment
description_text:
Greetings

I hope you’re doing well. I recently ordered a set of Simsonn pedals (Order
#SSN2054) and received confirmation that my order was shipped. However,
when I check the USPS tracking information, it has been showing “In
Transit” with no updates since July 30.

I’m concerned the package may have been lost in transit. Could you please
check on the status of the shipment and let me know the next steps?  I’m
really looking forward to receiving the pedals, so I hope we can resolve
this quickly.

Thank you for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Alexander I. Sanchez Perez

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Sánchez,     The tracking information for this ticket is delayed. Since USPS does not provide after-sales service, our US warehouse staff recommends that you contact your local office to check the delivery status. If there are any problems, we will resolve them for you, please do not worry.   Phone: +1 (800) 275-8777
